# Testing Guide

## Overview

Testing strategy and conventions for **{{repoName}}**.

## Test Pyramid

| Level | Tool | Location | Purpose |
|-------|------|----------|---------|
| Unit | <!-- e.g. Vitest --> | `src/**/*.test.ts` | Test individual functions and classes |
| Integration | <!-- e.g. Vitest + Testcontainers --> | `tests/integration/` | Test module interactions |
| E2E | <!-- e.g. Playwright --> | `tests/e2e/` | Test full user workflows |

## Running Tests

```bash
# Run all tests
pnpm test

# Run unit tests only
<!-- e.g. pnpm test:unit -->

# Run with coverage
<!-- e.g. pnpm test:coverage -->

# Run in watch mode
<!-- e.g. pnpm test:watch -->
```

## Writing Tests

### Naming Convention

- Test files: `<module>.test.ts` or `<module>.spec.ts`
- Describe blocks: Name of the unit under test
- It blocks: Expected behaviour in plain English

### Test Structure

```typescript
describe('UserService', () => {
  it('should return a user by ID', async () => {
    // Arrange
    // Act
    // Assert
  });
});
```

## Coverage Targets

| Metric | Minimum |
|--------|---------|
| Line coverage | <!-- e.g. 80% --> |
| Branch coverage | <!-- e.g. 75% --> |
| Function coverage | <!-- e.g. 80% --> |
